News.headline: Loan Announcement: Scott Heard Extends Loan Deal With East Thurrock United
News.page_title: Loan Announcement: Scott Heard Extends Loan Deal With East Thurrock United
News.URL_keywords: Loan Announcement: Scott Heard Extends Loan With East Thurrock United
News.short_description: Scott Heard has extended his loan with East Thurrock United until the..... 2017
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that midfielder Scott Heard has extended his loan for another..... with National League South club East Thurrock United until..... 2017.Â 

The midfielder has so far made four appearances for East Thurrock since joining them on loan in February.

The midfielder joined the Daggers in October and has made eight appearances for the club so far this season, with six of those coming from the bench.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how Heard is doing on his loan spell at East Thurrock United.

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers

Twitter: @Dag_RedFC
